= Introduction =

Application Design:
High level design is available on SystemArchitecture page.

USE CASE diagram is available on http://code.google.com/p/reco-gnizr/wiki/UMLDiagram page.

= Details =

Detailed Design will consist of following components:
 * client UI layout displaying URLs with user feedback options
 * client component for Web content scraping,
 * server component for web content analysis,
 * user feedback manager at server,
 * bookmark retriever an interface to gnizr bookmarks database.
